This popular edition in our Street series of India Pale Ales spotlights the remarkably complex Mosaic hop Melcher Street is hazy pale orange in appearance and emits aromatic qualities of grapefruit mild earthy pine and mango on the nose Dank flavors of pine and green hop along with juicy notes of tropical fruit melon and peach are accentuated with crisp malt character mild bitterness and soft effervescent mouthfeel MALT American row Barley White Wheat Dextrine DextroseHOPS Mosaic Columbus

The First release in Old Nation New Orthodox IPA series is designed to accentuate the deep and complex character from the combination of Calypso Simcoe Citra and Amarillo hops Citrus and Tropical notes of Pineapple Mango and Grapefruit come through in the huge yet surprisingly delicate aroma The flavor backs these aromas with soft pillowy mouthfeel Hop bitterness is not particularly intense which leads to very drinkable New England IPA even non IPA fans love The Haze is not from yeast but rather from an interplay of lipids from the malted oat and oils and acids which naturally occur in the hand selected Dry hops This beer is perfect interplay between top grade malt and hops MI water and brewing technique which cannot be faked Hops aren cheap but is worth every penny IBU
A huge but dry triple IPA packed with Motueka Amarillo Citra and Mosaic

Welcome to the future Our collective human consciousness or Ghost in the Machine has gained tolerance for hops beyond what mankind has ever known before This double India Pale Ale is the necessary outcome IBU

Juice Machine was originally devised and brewed to support our very first trip to Extreme Beer Festival in We ve revived and tweaked the original recipe on BBL scale and brought new life and experience into the idea of an obscenely hop saturated yet juicy and delicate Double IPA It is essentially marriage of the King Julius malt bill with hopping intensity schedule similar to that of Very Green The use of Magnum Columbus Amarillo Citra and Galaxy creates perhaps our most complex drink with unapologetic flavors of tangerine mango lime papaya and grapefruit with waves of dankness Hop burp nirvana indeed

Ephraim was our great great grandfather Hill Farmstead Brewery resides several hundred feet downhill from the land that he and his father settled In his honor this Imperial India Pale Ale is dutifully crafted from American malted barley buckets of American hops our ale yeast and water from our well It is unfiltered naturally carbonated and double dry hopped Intensely aromatic and saturated with resinous hop flavor this is the ale that dream to have shared with Ephraim Theoretical IBUPale Malt Dextrose Centennial Chinook Columbus Simcoe and Warrior hops Ale Yeast and our Well Water

This beer was conceived with the intent to push the concept of Doppelganger to the limit of flavor and intensity Both the kettle hopping rates and dry hopping rates were increased while keeping the base beer the same The result is intense but also surprising in its balance and softness The mouthfeel is viscous and coating with flavors of overripe mango dank citrus and tropical fruit balanced by sharp but pleasant finish treat to warm you up as true New England winter takes hold
Our third single hop beer brewed with citra hops Big citrus aromas with delicate dry malt presence juicy resinous orangey hop flavor makes this beer treat for lovers of hoppy beer

Same base grist as Sleeper Street IPA but with double dose of El Dorado in the dry hop These El Dorado hops impart powerful aroma of distinctive lime zest along with notes of grapefruit juice and subtle woodsy earthiness The taste is bright floral and citrusy hop upfront and finishes with candied lime As with all Trillium Street IPA Double Dry Hopped Sleeper Street is dry with medium light body and crisp finish MALT American row Barley White Wheat Dextrine HOPS El Dorado Columbus

In brewed an American Pale Ale Beneficiaries of Chance in celebration of marrying the love of my life Lauren aka Tree House Dog On the eve of our first anniversary brewed another beer for Lauren In Perpetuity It hopes to celebrate foreverness in love passion and regardless of circumstance the notion that what is good and beloved will last forever In Perpetuity is brewed with simple malt bill and two of my favorite hops Citra and Nelson It pours hazy bright orange in the glass and mixes notes of tropical fruit with strong citrus backbone Soft and eminently drinkable hope you enjoy it Notes on the can design Artist and friend Dean McKeever has created memorable piece of artwork displaying Sand Beach in Acadia National Park at night magical place that everyone in New England should visit especially at night
If you love Resin try tasting it straight from the tanks That Puff hazy unfiltered pour straight from the tanks with an extra dose of dry hops new blend devised just for Puff
FAR AWAY ACROSS THE FIELD there is golden IIPA with tropical bright citrus mild pine and smooth soft lightly sweet malt that will take you home home again

This medium bodied American style IPA has an alluring golden glow and beautifully blends three strains of hops While strong citrus notes ambush your taste buds halfway through the palate the beer finishes very crisp and dry IBU

A kicked up version of Haze Very Hazy is beer that makes us Very Happy Very Hazy conveys all the beautiful flavors of Haze but with even greater depth and potency Pungent grapefruit notes greet your palate while an underlying current of soft tropical fruit dances in the background Just the right amount of bitterness balances the sweet fruit flavors while velvety soft mouthfeel make you easily and dangerously forget this one clocks in at ABV huge and beautiful beer that maintains softness and delicacy beer we are very excited about
Harlan is Edward slightly more aggressive alter ego Dry Hopped exclusively with Columbus hops

UPPER CASE has delicate dry pilsner malt character with smooth soft doughy mouthfeel from the raw wheat oily hop resin which all serves as canvas for this twice dry hopped double IPA Overripe mango pineapple and passion fruit aromas leap out as the beer is poured The impression of tropical fruit also takes the lead in the flavor which is layered further by white wine pine resin and grapefruit zest Hopped primarily with Mosaic with supporting roles played by Galaxy Citra and Columbus MALT Pilsner Flaked Wheat Dextrine DextroseHOPS Mosaic Galaxy Citra Columbus
Imperial Pale Ale brewed almost exclusively with Mosaic hops from the Pacific Northwest

The first Double IPA produced at our Canton brewery Featuring four powerful aromatic hop varieties Galaxy Mosaic Nelson Sauvin and Columbus Scaled Up emits dank spicy aromas that lead into fruity citrusy flavors of peach and orange on the palate Lighter in body than most of our other Double IPAs Scaled Up finishes dry and smooth with pleasant bitterness MALT Pilsner White Wheat Flaked Wheat Dextrine Dextrose HOPS Galaxy Mosaic Nelson Sauvin Columbus

Julius Gone Wild not funky wild like insane hop saturation wild For the second special edition of Julius brewed specifically for the third anniversary party we pushed the level of citrus to the fringes of obscenity through additional kettle and dry hopping with the base Julius hop blend The result is perhaps the most juicy and delectable creation we have ever made Preposterous Julius in the best way imaginable

An intensified version of Scaled and the latest addition to our line up of aromatic juicy IPA The secondary dry hop of El Dorado and Citra results in an enhanced nose of citrus pineapple and wet earth The flavor brings intense lime refreshingly pithy bitterness and just touch of toasted malt Medium bodied with dry finish MALT American row Barley White Wheat Flaked Wheat Dextrine HOPS El Dorado Citra Columbus

Kvas is non alcoholic cereal beverage which is produced from Sourdough Rye Bread Malt and Sugar Kvas has golden brown color the pleasant flavor of Rye Bread low sweetness and sufficient carbonate to give Kvas sparkle on the palate

Stepan Timofeevich is the traditional St Petersburg brand of kvass which appeared on the market of the Northwestern Region in one of the first brands of its kind In the beginning the brand was virtually not supported by ads and the design remained the same since the days of its first appearance on the market In September Deka Company expanded its brand portfolio by purchasing Stepan Timofeevich brand the second largest market player in St Petersburg The purchase of Stepan Timofeevich TM was strategic move by the company to improve its leading position on the second largest national market of Russia The trademark has earned considerable loyalty of consumers in the North West of Russia traditional Russian kvass Invigorates and strengthens the immune system with useful microelements and enzymes that are beneficial for digestion Deka Company has retained the old recipe and improved the taste of Petersburgers favorite kvass
Produced at Deka but owned by PepsiCo

Nikola is natural live fermentation kvass It contains only natural ingredients baking yeast barley and rye malt sugar and purified water The traditional production technology and natural raw materials contribute to the outstanding consumer properties of the beverage its excellent ability to quench thirst medicinal and invigorating properties Nikola kvass also boasts number of health benefits it prevents the spread of germs because the product contains lactic acid vitamins amino acids sugars and micronutrients

We partnered with Patisserie South Minneapolis French bakery to make Pass the Kvassier light refreshing kvass ale with rich spicy notes light tartness and subtle stone fruit undertones to accompany lightly sour malty beer that goes down easy at just ABV Sixty loaves of Patisserie vollkornbrot german sour rye bread and some rye malt were used to make mash that was then fermented using the bakery sourdough yeast culture
Семейный секрет Бородинский домашний Квас

In the distant past the Slavs revered the inflammatory and merry God of the sun of Jarila They believed in his ability to awaken the inner strength of man and fill with the joy of life Today our everyday life revives the kvass Yarilo each breath of which greatly invigorates and quenches thirst The product of live fermentation on the basis of grain crops used traditionally for the preparation of kvass Jarilo has rich bread taste and pleasant aroma It perfectly refreshes and quickly gives sense of recovery of vitality

With light fruity aroma and bright crisp finish Goose Island Summertime Kölsch is the perfect summer session ale Kölsch beer brewed in the traditional German fashion you ll find yourself enjoying and savoring each sip of Summertime as much as you do those hot summer days and cool summer nights IBU

Formerly Yellowtail Pale Ale and Pale Ale The Original There no wonder why our Pale Ale is so popular it is skillfully crafted in the style of the Kolsch beers of Cologne Germany We ve chosen German hops for aroma and rounded out the recipe with blend of American and German malts While it is very much like pilsner our Pale Ale is fermented at ale temperatures giving it subdued fruitiness perfect compliment to the crispness of the wheat and maltiness of the Munich malt If you like lighter brew but also like the complexity of craft beers then our Pale Ale is for you IBU

A true German style Kölsch Originally brewed in Cologne this beer is crisp and refreshing yet has sweet malty body that is balanced by complex citrus hop character Multiple additions of German Hallertauer hops are used to achieve this delicate flavor We use special Kölsch yeast an ale yeast that ferments at lager temperatures to yield the slightly fruity clean flavor of this beer Fancy Lawnmower Beer is world class brew yet light enough to be enjoyed by Texans after strenuous activities like mowing the lawn Bronze Medal Great American Beer Festival

Formerly Alaskan Summer Ale Alaskan Summer Ale balances softly malted palate with the clean freshness of hops In the tradition of the style neither overpowers the other Both hops and malt come together to refresh and renew the palate The straw gold color and easy drinkability are an enjoyable way to celebrate summer

Our Kölsch is classic golden ale that uses centuries old yeast strain sourced from famous Kölsch brewer in Köln Germany Fermented at degrees then cold conditioned it has the delicate fruity aroma of an ale with the crisp clean finish of lager It is brewed with lightly roasted malt and German Noble Hops Perle for bitterness and Hallertau Traditional for flavor and aroma In the term Kölsch was used to describe the ale brewed in Köln city on the Rhine River in western Germany The style began to rise in popularity in the s and now many American craft brewers brew variations of the style labeling it golden ale Our Kölsch is unique to the Schlafly brewery because Ulrike native of Köln and wife of brewery co founder Tom Schlafly connected Schlafly Beer with the Gaffel Brewery of Köln Schlafly Beer won the Gold Medal for Best German style Kölsch in the World Beer Cup in IBU
Formerly New Holland Lucid

Santo is black Kölsch which technically doesn exist as style but this is as close as we can come to describing it Essentially it is brewed using Kölsch recipe with the addition of Munich and black malt It is light bodied and floral yet with distinct dark malt flavor Our goal was to create dark yet refreshing beer that would pair perfectly with plate of enchiladas The label artwork is by Houston artist Carlos Hernandez who is known for his Day of the Dead Rock Star series of paintings and prints
A crisp and refreshing lighter summer offering this Kolsch style beer is golden in color light bodied and perfect remedy for hot weather IBU

We grow bees Taste the difference Ingredients Rogue Farms Dare and Risk Malts Wheat DextraPils Aciduated Malts Rogue Hopyard Honey Wild Flower Honey Alluvial Hops Free Range Coastal Water and Kolsch Yeast

Formerly known as Captain KölschThis is the first beer that we have brewed that is not considered an ale Brewed with imported German yeast Kolsch is style of beer that is stuck in between the two main styles of ale and lager not as fruity as an Ale and yet not quite as subtle as Lager our Kolsch blurs the lines between the two

Crunkle Sam tired of being mer anomaly as most refreshing summertime Barleywine Ale targeted German beer style and bastardized it He had us brew traditional Kolsch but made us add all natural mango flavor Warning This beer is NOT Reinheitsgebot

Our Left Coast take on crisp classic German style ale is hopped up with zesty American and European hops for twist on traditional light bodied beer From Cologne to California Kölsch style beers are favorite around the world prized for their incredible drinkability while maintaining depth of flavor As our stamp on this style this Kölsch style has punch of bright citrusy American whole cone hops to add West Coast character to this well traveled ale

Brewed in homage to the beer of Cologne Krankshaft is pale straw hued smile in glass We throw in little wheat malt to round out an easy Santiam hop bitterness There are no Köbes to serve them up but you should feel free to have as many as you like IBU
Our take on kolsch style ale that is soft on the palate with delicate malt flavor Balanced with touch of wheat and honey notes Dry and wine like with flowery hop finish

A clean crisp beer Kolsch offers very slight fruity flavor and aroma It is light gold in color with delicate head This light bodied beer appeals to nearly everyone who samples it Expect to enjoy slight tang in the finish Our Brew Master Says Kolsch is my favorite light beer style hands down Crisp tangy and light on the palate outstanding Food Pairings Leafy green salad with creamy dressing broiled lobster grilled or steamed shrimp fried soft shell crab peach cobbler Preferred Glass StangeAvailability Year RoundABV Calories

Golden hued crisp and finely balanced Lug Tread is our tribute to the classic beer of Cologne Germany Lug Tread is top fermented like an ale and then cold aged like lager for lengthy period This gives our beer some light ale notes complemented by lager like crispness Lug Tread displays interwoven malt and hop flavours subtle fruit flavours and crisp lingering finish
The style of this ale is traditionally European similar to German kolsch full bodied with spicy hop tang and rich crystal clear golden color Alcohol content is approximately by volume
Our German style Kolsch pays homage to the traditional beer of Cologne It pours pale straw color delivering floral hop notes and smooth malt character developed from extended cold aging
Kolsch style ale brewed with chamomile ginger and lemongrass IBUs

This amplified version of Sprang our hoppy welcome to Spring is kölsch inspired ale cool fermented and dosed heavily with Nelson Sauvin Lower fermentation temperature slows the yeast metabolism and provides balance by gently subduing super fruity esters and spicy phenols Big Sprang is medium bodied with dank aromatics of earthy evergreen passion fruit and faint doughy malt Flavors of juicy concord grape mango and herbaceous white wine interweave with cracker crisp pilsner malt character and minimal bitterness The finish is dry with lasting touch of grain MALT Pilsner Valley Danko Rye Dextrine DextroseHOPS Nelson Sauvin Goldings

Whether taking break from hard day of work or just huge day of hops this crisp refreshing beer with hint of orange will lift your spirits without lowering your expectations for what craft beer should be

Modeled after the bright beautiful ales of Koln our interpretation has clean crisp malt character similar to Pilsner The authentic Kolsch yeast strain pairs perfectly with our unique blend of aromatic Noble hops from Germany

A pale golden ale featuring crisp clean malt flavor Gold Spike is the perfect quaff for warm day or when you are just looking for something bit more refreshing Brewed true to style this interpretation of German Kölsch uses an authentic yeast strain tracing to the beer ancestral home of Cologne

Our Tart Peach Kölsch is fresh take on one of our very first beers The juicy aroma and flavor of ripe peach complements the subtle fruitiness from the Kölsch yeast in this bright refreshing ale Add tickle of tartness to round out the senses and you get new brew that interestingly delightful
A very light golden ale that is malty sweet almost honey like in the nose This ale has light to medium body and very delicate flavor Easy drinking it has very low bitterness and soft dry finish IBU

Brewed using blend of imported and classic American aroma hops and blend of barley malts and rice Budweiser is brewed with time honored methods including kraeusening for natural carbonation and Beechwood aging which results in unparalleled balance and character

Pabst Blue Ribbon is brewed in the finest traditions of an American Premium Lager dating back to Brewed with combination of row malted barley select cereal grains and American and European hops Pabst Blue Ribbon is fermented with proprietary lager yeast Our unique fermentation and maturation process results in smooth full bodied beer with clean crisp finish with fine noble hop aroma ABV Calories
Also known as Coronita Extra small bottles and Corona Familiar larger bottles

Miller High Life also known as the Champagne of Beers is quintessentially classic American style lager In Frederick Miller created Miller High Life because he believed that the good life the High Life should be accessible to everyone not just the upper crust To this day Miller High Life continues to be faithfully brewed as golden pilsner utilizing light stable galena hops from the Pacific Northwest and select combination of malted barley

In Diageo moved production of the S supply of Red Stripe from Jamaica to the S The supply is produced by City Brewing Co in La Crosse Wisconsin and the Latrobe Brewing Company in Latrobe Pennsylvania which was the main brewery for Rolling Rock for over years Desnoes Geddes will still make Red Stripe for Jamaica Brazil Canada and Europe

Coors Banquet is brewed with Rocky Mountain water and Moravian barley from many generations of family farmers True to its roots it is brewed only in one place Golden Colorado and nowhere else Ingredients Water barley malt corn syrup dextrose yeast hop extract

Using time honored recipe with only the finest malted barley and blend of hops Rolling Rock is classic American lager that is as well known for its distinctive full bodied taste as it is for its craftsmanship heritage and painted green bottle Full flavored with subtle bite Light to medium body and color Brewed with only the choicest ingredients perfect blend of pale barley malt rice and corn
An authentic Mexican cerveza brewed in the style of Pilsner Lagers with nuanced blend of malts spices and earth tones Ingredients Water Malted barley Corn starch syrup Hops Ascorbic Acid

Brewed as model of what good beer should be this rich full flavored Pilsner style Lager delivers crisp refreshing taste Well balanced taste and light hop character with crisp clean finish Modelo Especial is characterized by an orange blossom honey aroma with hint of herb

Miller Genuine Draft delivers fresh from the tap taste through its proprietary cold filtered four times brewing process Introduced nationally in Miller Genuine Draft was born as the original cold filtered packaged draft beer Today Miller Genuine Draft is reinforcing its status as the best draft beer in bottle

Labatt Blue is the best selling Canadian beer in the world Introduced in as Labatt Pilsener it was named for the colour of its label by fans of the Winnipeg Blue Bombers football team Blue was the first brand in Canada with twist off cap and won the silver medal in the International Lager category at the Brewing Industry International Awards Labatt Blue brewed using specially selected aromatic hops is well balanced fully matured full flavoured beer with fruity character and slightly sweet aftertaste
A well balanced bright golden lager beer with malt crisp flavor low to medium bitterness that finishes clean

Cerveza Pacífico Clara better known as Pacífico is Mexican pilsner style beer It was first brewed in when three Germans opened brewery the Cerveceria del Pacífico in Mazatlán Cerveza Pacifico is named so because the Pacifico brewery is located in the Pacific Ocean port city of Mazatlán in the state of Sinaloa México Its label includes picture depicting lifesaver encompassing hill with the port lighthouse known locally as Cerro del Crestón In Mazatlán the beer is available in three different size bottles cuartitos fl oz medias fl oz and ballenas fl oz Clara means clear as opposed to obscura dark

Around the world Canada is seen as shining example of nature at its best We have thousands of freshwater lakes and barley fields as far as the eye can see That what makes us so proud to brew Molson Canadian our signature beer Brewed without preservatives from St Johns to Vancouver over Canadians have hand in bringing Molson Canadian to their family their friends and their communities The people who live here truly deserve beer brewed with the best this land has to offer That why we make sure our award winning lager is as clean crisp and fresh as the incredible country it comes from

Busch and Busch Light are both brewed with blend of premium American grown and imported hops and combination of malt and corn to provide pleasant balanced flavor Additionally Busch Light undergoes longer brewing process that produces lighter body and fewer calories

Born in the heart of Mexico in Sol is bright and refreshing lager It inspired by the sun and brewed to shine just like those who drink it The ones that radiate good vibes that lighten the mood and always look at life on the bright side The ones who not only shine but shine their way

Natural Ice is brewed with blend of premium American grown and imported hops and combination of malt and corn that lends Natural Ice its delicate sweetness It then undergoes Anheuser Busch exclusive ice brewing process which takes the beer to temperature below freezing and leads to the formation of ice crystals which create its signature rich and smooth taste

Made on Honor for five generations The Famous Narragansett Lager has been one of the greats since Pre Prohibition era drinkers toasted Gansett Dr Suess illustrated Gansett the Sox scored with Gansett and Captain Quint crushed Gansett Today the highest rated heritage American lager according to Beer Advocate is brewed to be clean crisp refreshing and perfectly balanced Hi Neighbor Have Gansett

America first domestic ice beer Icehouse is traditionally brewed fermented and just before aging its temperature is lowered to below freezing This process imparts the beer smoothness and an alcohol content that slightly higher by volume than other regular premium beer brands Icehouse was introduced in and has reinforced its position as the ultimate beer for wind up and pre game occasions Blending humor and high energy excitement Icehouse marketing encourages its target consumers to take occasions to the next level with great tasting beer

Anheuser Busch exclusive ice brewing process takes the beer to temperature below freezing which leads to the formation of ice crystals in the finishing process that gives Bud Ice its rich smooth taste

Hamm first brewed in Minnesota in is America classic beer Hamm is brewed using the purest water and the choicest barley malt grain and hops The beer that is Born in the Land of Sky Blue Waters is available in select states Ingredients Water Barley Malt Corn Syrup Maltose Yeast Hops

Lone Star Beer uses the finest hops from the Pacific Northwest with hearty grains from the Central and Northern Plains Malted barley and corn extract combine to provide Lone Star with nature finest ingredients for brewing Lone Star ingredients give this beer its full natural flavor The choicest hops lend complexity and aroma to this beer and its proprietary mashing regimen creates the perfect balance of alcohol body and character ABV Calories

Released to the market in for more than seven decades Presidente has been connected to particular way of feeling and being Dominican associating occasions of consumption with great celebrations among friends and developing true beer culture within our country The successful presence of Presidente in international markets together with its great acceptance by tourists who visit us contributes to the international display of the quality of products from the Dominican Republic and the resources and attractions of the country and its people

For those of you familiar with the Solid Gold we ve featured in our taproom for years this is not the same beer Our Brewmaster Jeremy completely revamped the recipe and it now features lager yeast corn and lemondrop hops for just the right hit of flavor Our take on classic Solid Gold is drinkable golden lager brewed with the highest quality ingredients Challenging what lager can be That something we won regret IBU
Formerly Milwaukee Best Premium

Originally called Golden Leaf Lager in the Old Style first appeared in local stores in and quickly became one of the region most widely enjoyed beers It heritage and popularity are proudly displayed throughout Wisconsin and Illinois one can go far without seeing historically protected Old Style sign hanging on the side of barn or in tavern window Old Style first crossed state lines into Illinois to capitalize nationwide bottlers strike and subsequent product rationing by the competition It wasn long before Old Style became Chicago beer served from the North Side to the South Side and everywhere in between Being accepted as true local Old Style began sponsoring the Chicago Cubs in With Old Style still being served at Wrigley Field today the partnership is one of longest standing in the country In Old Style revived the centuries old German brewing tradition called Kraeusening This double fermentation process increases carbonation and richness ultimately leading to better tasting beer that has since been won medals at the Great American Beer Festival and World Beer Cup

Milwaukee Best was first brewed by Gettelman in the s and became part of the Miller family in refreshing smooth highly drinkable Ice Lager The temperature of Milwaukee Best Ice is lowered to below freezing during brewing to form ice crystals that impart the beer smoothness and alcohol content Milwaukee Best Ice won the bronze medal for American Style Specialty Lager at the Great American Beer Festival and World Beer Cup Born in Milwaukee WI Milwaukee Best Ice is refreshing smooth highly drinkable American Style Ice Lager Milwaukee Best Ice is available in variety of packages
Brewed with six row barley malt corn grits and hops from the Yakima Valley

Stroh American Lager is full bodied beer that upholds the Stroh family rich brewing tradition and the Detroit spirit Brewed in Milwaukee WI with American grown Galena and Cascade hops Stroh American Lager delivers an excellence in taste that is balanced to perfection

Although the Grain Belt Premium recipe has changed hands over the years one thing has remained the same its legendary unique taste And now that Premium is in the capable hands of brewery with an even longer tradition than Grain Belt the August Schell Brewery may you rest assured that the flavor and heritage of Premium will live on forever

Brewed under contract for Pabst by Miller Brewing Co Classic Formula Schlitz Gusto reintroduced in oz bottles oz tallboy cans and draft Original Schlitz in oz cans and draft http beeradvocate com beer profile

This deluxe American Pilsner is brewed with premium American malt and perfect touch of American grown hops The Lionshead family of beers is brewed using our state of the art brew kettle and our century old brewhouse Lionshead has crisp dry mouth feel with subtle touch of sweet overtones

A century of brewing tradition meets modern day in our flagship brew Dixie adheres to the highest quality standards using pale malt rice and Cascade and Cluster hops in its time honored day process delivering crisp flavorful premium beer

In the late Brooklyn was one of the largest brewing centers in the country home to more than breweries Lager beer in the Vienna style was one of the local favorites Brooklyn Lager is amber gold in color and displays firm malt center supported by refreshing bitterness and floral hop aroma Caramel malts show in the finish The aromatic qualities of the beer are enhanced by dry hopping the centuries old practice of steeping the beer with fresh hops as it undergoes long cold maturation The result is wonderfully flavorful beer smooth refreshing and very versatile with food Dry hopping is largely British technique which we ve used in Viennese style beer to create an American original

Our flagship and most popular brew Toasted Lager is the best American amber Lager you ll ever taste To back up that claim we use six different grains to perfect balanced flavor of malt and hops and special proprietary lager yeast to give Toasted Lager an exceptional long lasting smooth finish that meant to be enjoyed year round Pairs perfectly with fresh seafood or any food for that matter IBU

Amber is Munich style lager brewed with crystal malt and Perle hops It has smooth malty slightly caramel flavor and rich amber color Abita Amber was the first beer offered by the brewery and continues to be our leading seller IBU

Vinyl sails in on her shining wings as the spinning sun returns She is the season shifter bursting from her cocoon to sing the ancient song of vernal yearning and to summon spring sweet green return Her metamorphosis becomes our own Her thirsts are shared by all Drink in her mysterious elixir as the revolution blooms again IBU

Barking Squirrel is ABV amber lager with distinct rich burnt orange colour and subtle noble hop aroma Its medium body pleasant hop bitterness and caramel malt sweetness makes it smooth and drinkable with slight hop aftertaste IBU
Rich hearty and full bodied gluten free lager brewed from sorghum Redbridge has distinctively fruity hop aroma sweet toasted grain flavor and well balanced moderately hopped finish

Brewed in Houston ZiegenBock is beer of the South Only available in Texas this American style amber lager offers notes of roasted grains in the aroma and sweet smooth taste with hop finish The select imported hops and specialty malts create taste worthy of Great American Beer Festival Bronze Medal

A beer inspired by The Playground of the World Classically brewed to pair perfectly with whatever amuses you Coney Island Lager is dry hopped classic American lager melding complex malty backbone with expressive hop notes for refreshingly balanced experience Malts Row Brewer Malt Maris Otter Flaked Barley Malted Wheat Munich Malt Vienna Malt CaramunichHops Warrior Cascade Tettnang SaazABV IBU
Grain Belt Nordeast is an American Amber lager and is the newest member to the Grain Belt Family It has light maltiness and hop aroma with mild bitterness Smooth taste with an excellent drinkability
This rich amber lager is the perfect balance of roasted caramel malts and clean hops flavors making it perfect choice for any occasion

Crafted using three different malted barleys Pacific Northwest hops and the finest Brewer Caramel Rickard Red is exceptionally flavorful with smooth finish Enjoy Canada favorite red beer with its proud pub heritage served cold in pint glass Brewed using three different malt barleys Pacific Northwest hops and the finest Brewer Caramel

Lager is made the world over but Creemore Springs Premium Lager is one of kind In all our travels we ve never found another like it From the start we ve fire brewed our flagship beer to be unique It always made with the best ingredients and strict adherence to traditional brewing methods It just different up here and so is our lager Our unique lager has brilliant copper colour overtones of sweet caramel malt and an appealing well balanced floral hop character It fire brewed using the best ingredients and our own spring water IBU

From the brewery Red Oak Amber is Munich Urtyp Old Style Lager We begin the brewing process with custom kilned imported Munich Malt Red Oak is then hopped with Spalt Noble Hops imported from Bavaria the oldest hop growing region in the world Before fermentation we add yeast strain from Weihenstephen the oldest brewery in the world founded before AD Weeks of aging gives Red Oak the smooth taste it is known for
Formerly Lashes Hopbock Lager Also known as Lashes Red IPL

Point Classic Amber is multi award winning amber style lager It boasts recipe of the highest quality natural ingredients Roasted caramel malts gives the beer its subtle caramel character and reddish amber hue American Tettnanger hops provide soft sweetness and gentle hop aroma The result is distinctive flavorful beer that is remarkably smooth and clean
Smooth Sleeman Honey Brown Lager is brewed in the tradition of cottage breweries at the turn of the century Some might think the tradition is outdated we just think we got it right the first time
A full bodied beer with warm amber hue showing off its rich malt heritage Mildly bittered featuring hop presence that compliments and rounds out the malt overtones
This beer is dark because the barley is roasted longer flavorful lager that everyone will enjoy

Colorado Native is hand crafted lager made with all Colorado ingredients that celebrates the joys of life in Colorado Hold up pint of Colorado Native and drink in its amber lager color brought to life with pale and caramel malts from our famous Moravian row barley We painstakingly balanced its malt character against select Chinook Centennial and Cascade hops to create perfectly balanced full flavored beer lager yeast fermentation gives Colorado Native slight fruitiness complementing citrus aroma note from late kettle hop addition Everything then comes together to deliver clean taste and dry finish that is very drinkable by itself or paired with your favorite foods

We brew our Michelob Honey Lager with European aromatic hops and toasted caramel barley malt for balanced taste What makes this beer really special however is the addition of touch of natural wildflower honey It all adds up to just slightly sweet and uniquely soft beer IBU
This full flavored amber lager delivers complex toasted malt body and noble hop character IBU

The Freedom Reserve is specialty red lager brewed with toasted barley grains for slightly sweet aroma with touch of hops rich caramel malt taste and smooth finish with hint of molasses Inspired by George Washington recipe For every case purchased Budweiser is donating to Folds of Honor non profit that provides scholarships to families of fallen or wounded soldiers

Our th Meridian Organic Amber Lager won gold at the International Brewing Awards in the Specialty Class Organic Beer category This beer was originally brewed at our Toronto brewpub and is an organic beer brewed with ingredients from west of the th Meridian Prairie pale amber and caramel malts are combined artfully with citrusy and floral west coast hops and then patiently fermented cool and aged cold in classic lager process to make truly unique beer Light copper in colour with white head and aroma of fresh hops this is truly satisfying amber lager for all beer lovers This beer is from time and place where quality and integrity aren just bywords or catch phrases they are part of the authentic fabric of the land and its people IBU

A smooth red lager without the bite We use four types of specialty malted barley and two types of hops Hallertau and Cascade which are added at the exact point in the brewing cycle to create the ideal quality blend of aroma and taste We use our own proprietary strain of lager yeast and all of our beers are brewed with our own on site natural artesian spring water from the historic Indian Wells Spring Mojave Red is lagered for several weeks then finished to our exacting standards

In thanks to an ice pond in the mountains and belief that anything is possible in the Golden State little brewery named Boca created California first genuine lager Anchor California Lager is our re creation of this historic beer Made in San Francisco with two row California barley Cluster hops the premier hop in th century California and our own lager yeast this all malt brew is kräusened and lagered in our cellars Its golden color distinctive aroma creamy head balanced depth of flavor and smooth finish make Anchor California Lager delicious celebration of California unique brewing heritage

Pure and crisp this is beer with nothing to hide Wisconsin two row barley malt ensures mellow and smooth body We imported Noble Hop varieties from Germany and the Czech Republic to ensure fine mature aroma with no coarse bitterness

Kosmos Spoetzl knew how to brew great beer Born in Bavaria Kosmos mastery of German brewing carried him as far as Egypt before he found his way to the small Texas town of Shiner Our proud brewery still carries his name and commitment to excellence in brewing This full flavored hop jacked lager is every bit as unique as the man himself and our way of saluting the brewmaster who started it all

Always brewing to taste and rarely to style Pilsner is the culmination of our love of American hops and appreciation of easy drinking styles Where traditional Pilsners typically feature European Noble hops our version celebrates some of our favorite American varieties Chinook Centennial Cascade and Crystal Crisp and bright with notes of citrus this Pilsner is refreshingly untraditional ABV The recipe is exactly the same as PC Pils We wanted to give the beer refresh as far as the name and packaging go something that spoke better to the beer inside Pilsner will be available in pack cans and draft from June September in Michigan Ohio Illinois Wisconsin Pennsylvania Indiana and New Jersey

By experimenting with both lager and ale yeast strains the brewers at Sam Adams came up with the concept for brand new beer Sam This truly unique brew takes two active fermentations and blends them together to create deliciously harmonious result This process delivers distinct flavor that showcases the slight fruitiness of an ale with the balanced drinkability and smoothness of lager Sam will surprise any craft beer lover with its huge flavor and aroma along with light bodied refreshing crispness At just ABV this brew is perfect for those sessionable occasions Cascade Citra Mosaic Simcoe and Galaxy hops impart tropical citrus aroma that gives way to bright juicy citrus hop flavor but without the hop bitterness The brewers have been experimenting for over year tested over iterations with multiple combinations of different hop varieties in the nano brewery in Boston in order to perfect the Sam recipe IBU

Deep golden in color this low ABV lager balances Pilsner and Munich malt with an aromatic American hop aroma This beer starts hoppy but finishes unexpectedly malty with very low bitterness Impressively flavorful and drinkable for the lightest beer we brew We dub this beer Session Lager as we once again brew lager in beer style of its own Uses local Soft Red Winter Wheat from Four Star Farms IBU
A smooth mellow beer of moderate sweetness not too bitter and slightly malty

contemporary rendition of classic style Hopped with purpose Joe is beautifully bitter and dry with an abundance of floral Noble German hops Uber sessionable Utterly American This is Premium American Pilsner

This crisp bohemian style lager was first brewed in Shiner way back in The early bottles of Premium proudly displayed cotton ball on the label tribute to the hardworking Czech and German immigrants who farmed cotton around the region After long day in the fields these farmers often found cold bottle of Shiner Premium waiting on fence post left there by our own Kosmos Spoetzl It no wonder that Premium soon became known as the local favorite and now it back Reintroduce yourself to Shiner Premium beer that will take you back and treat you right Prosit

Imagine you set sail for three hour tour Let say from the port of Escondido work with us here The weather started getting rough You re tiny ship but not lunch thankfully was tossed Long story short You re marooned on remote island somewhere near the Tropic of Thunder The good news is that the Capt Of the S Stone and her brewing kit were among the small cast of colorful characters that survived the rough voyage with you Mainstays Citra and Mosaic along with newcomer Cashmere hops are joined by their juicy tropical aromas of citrus pineapple and coconut try stringing all that together in catchy tune The rescue ship will find you all soon enough For now set aside the non working cell phone and lack of social media again work with us here kick back and revel in your moment of tropical island lagoon serenity

Take aim at Shmaltz newest year round offering an American Craft Lager thoughtfully created to stand up to the big beer Goliaths of the world Boasting bright citrusy hop aroma supported by touches of wheat and rye Slingshot is guaranteed to strike the craft beer bullseye every time Slingshot pours bright straw color with thin white head and light lacing The aroma features juicy tropical fruit notes of peach lemon and red grapefruit with the light spice accent of noble hops The polished malt bill is mainly row pale malt with portions of Vienna and touch of wheat and rye to add delicate balance to the spice and fruit It is medium in body with smooth refreshing mouthfeel to make Slingshot well balanced easy drinking American craft lager

Introducing our limited edition Midnight Lager When winter hits we often reach for something little special little richer even little darker But we don always crave the same flavors and textures of the usual dark beers That why we created Stella Artois Midnight Lager This limited release dark lager has light to medium body balanced drinkability ABV and surprisingly crisp dry finish that helps make the season feel original again IBU

Nomad is czech style dark lager or tmavé pivo constructed with deliberate attention to detail tradition and patience It is brewed with authentic floor malted bohemian pilsner malt german dark malts and carefully selected noble hops laborious mashing and conditioning process yields complex texture and malt profile Nomad pours nearly pitch black in the glass Through extended natural conditioning not hint of haze remains An aggressive pour yields thick and billowing head that clings to the side of the glass as you work your way through the pour It is the most appealing looking beer we have made in recent memory We taste mild chocolate brown bread hay and earthy noble hops It goes down remarkably easy while leaving pleasant and lingering impression on your palate The mark of great beer is the ease in which it drinks in conjunction with potent appealing and incisive flavors To that end we are extraordinarily proud to offer Nomad to you for your enjoyment m not sure if there is another beer we will collectively drink more of this autumn at Tree House
Sweet and honey molasses flavour slightly hopped with fuller mouth feel

Kronenbourg was named after the year the Hatt family the founders of Kronenbourg Itis the fifth oldest beer brand in the world that still exists today Its golden hues and delicate bitterness come from selecting the best hops the Strisselspalt and the unique know how of Kronenbourg master brewers for over years Strisselspalt is also named the caviar of hops by the expert master brewers around the world for its low bitterness and aromatic qualities Its specific soil and culture technique requirements makes it rare and quite unique to the Alsace Region and Kronenbourg recipes

Intensa lager extra con un excelente equilibrio entre las maltas los lúpulos su alto volumen de alcohol Es el resultado de la recuperación de una receta histórica de Hijos de Rivera la Especial Extra La Colorada Su elaboración en nuestro único centro productivo sigue nuestras pautas tradicionales las mejores materias primas un mosto específico una guarda prolongada De color oro viejo brillante Aromáticamente se percibe el balance hacia las maltas con agradables notas dulces caramelo En boca el amargor equilibra su alto grado alcohólico su ligero postgusto picante strong lager that offers perfect balance between the malts the hops and the high alcohol content Our Brewmasters recover one of the old Hijos de Rivera historic recipes the Especial Extra aka La Colorada Brewed in the only Company brewery placed in Coruña using our traditional methods best ingredients long maturing time passion for the excellence An intense amber beer In aroma the balance shifts slightly in favor of the malts with pleasant sweet notes caramel like The bitterness balances the intense alcohol content and the light piquant aftertaste

Schlenkerla Helles is brewed with fine Bavarian aroma hops from the area around the city of Nürnberg It lagered in century old caves underneath the historic Schlenkerla brewery and maltings Schlenkerla Helles is boiled in the same copper kettles and bottom fermented by the same yeast as the historic Schlenkerla Smokebeer Its subtle smokiness without using smoke malt makes Helles Schlenkerla Lager unique representative of the classic lager beer style Bavarian Helles
