Our Helles Style Summer Lager is bright golden beer perfect for summertime The malts we use impart wonderful fresh grain character reminiscent of European lagers The German Noble hop Mittelfrüh lends mild lemony spicy flavor The German word Helles translates as light and Lager means to store This beer style emerged in Germany through the Spaten Brewery marriage of British Bohemian and German brewing techniques This style is an integral part of brewing history and predecessor of the straw colored light bodied beers which are the most widely consumed beers in the world today The lager yeast ferments the beer more slowly and at lower temperatures it is then stored for maturation This results in beer which is more smooth and drinkable Today many American craft brewers offer this style as maltier and hoppier alternative to American light lagers IBU

From the German word for Bright our golden lager displays floral hop aroma with bready malt balance Traditional in style Helles is brewed with Pilsner Malt to produce dry snappy finish while Perle and Tettnanger hops create spicy herbal hop aroma The result is an incredibly clean yet complex lager IBU
German Pils malt Saaz Hallertauer Hops IBU

Its head is firm and fine pored Its aroma is pure and fresh from the cellar with soft malty accents imbued with floral hoppiness Its light and soft body leaves pleasant tangy taste in the mouth The mild sweetness marries well with the velvety bitterness of the hops It concludes on rounded harmonious note Andechser Vollbier Hell is therefore classical Bavarian Vollbier

Nace en como la Especial Rivera Pronto se convirtió en la cerveza más representativa de la Compañía Elaborada partir de un mosto específico en el único centro de producción de Hijos de Rivera en Coruña Los Maestros Cerveceros emplean en su fabricación aproximadamente un mes de trabajo el del cual se dedica su guarda en frío Cerveza dorada brillante Excelente balance aromático entre las maltas lúpulos En boca ligeramente floral herbal de calidez moderada con una intensa prolongada sensación lupulada Born in as Especial Rivera it would soon become Company most representative beer Brewed by Hijos de Rivera Brewmasters in the only Company brewery placed in Coruña It takes whole month to be brewed half of it inside the maturing tanks Golden color Clean and bright Excellent aromatic balance between malts and hops Lightly floral and herbal flavors with moderate warm mouthfeel and an intense hoppy bitter taste that lingers in the mouth

We created our first Firestone Lager in and it proved to be well ahead of its time Now it back new and improved for those who finally want better lager In craft world dominated by hoppy beers we have gone back to basics with Firestone Lager this is our hardest beer to make and our easiest one to drink Made in the classic all malt Munich Helles style Firestone Lager demands technical perfection from our brewing team with transparent canvas that would otherwise reveal the smallest flaw Gambrinus pilsner malt establishes crisp dry base with soft mouthfeel while noble German hops provide just whisper of bitterness The result is an impossibly smooth and immensely drinkable beer that aims to help redefine American Lager In the words of Brewmaster Matt Brynildson Firestone Lager is made for drinking not thinking It all about enjoying good clean beer
Nationally acclaimed as the best Munich style beer made in America Penn Gold is light colored medium bodied lager beer with delicate hop aroma

Golden Lager While Gold Leaf is on the lighter side it takes five weeks to perfect this traditional German style lager An homage to the days when beers were made from malted barley Gold Leaf is brewed with four European malts tempered with touch of three imported hops Plus it got subtle bready notes And since it not super hoppy or dark this beer doesn hide any flavor inconsistencies That just keeps us honest Malts Pilsner Weyermann Pilsner Vienna Acidulated MaltHops Northern Brewer Saaz TettnangIBU COLOR Gold

Where the Helles Summer is classic German style lager These beers originated in the th century as response to Pilsener beers from Czech brewers Helles is German for bright In the brewing world we translate it as light light in color and light in alcohol Where the Helles Summer is clean bready beer drinker beer balanced with austere noble hop varieties It malt forward and forward thinking to the warmer days just ahead

Beer sensory characteristics creamy compact head crowns the glass Brilliant delicately pearled with bubbles and golden yellow it captivates the eye of the true connoisseur The aroma is lightly reminiscent of flowering hops The body is pure mild discretely aromatic coupled with slight sweetness The finish is soft with hint of maltiness lager that awakens the desire to drink it again and again Mahrs Bräu Hell pairing recommendation to cooked or fried fish dishes salads mild cheeses stews

A true Helles style our lager is golden in color with pleasant malty aroma balanced by rich smooth flavor Using only the finest Bavarian malts and finished with Saaz hops one sip will make you feel like you re in one of Germany finest beer gardens

Rahr Blonde Lager was the first beer to come out of Rahr Sons Brewing Company It is medium bodied traditional Munich style Helles Lager that features rounded maltiness without being too heavy And like every proud Texan it has good head is pleasant but not overly sweet Have some fun with blonde today

Unfiltered Helles LagerMarie Ange is our maternal great grandmother fondly remembered as Mémé Born in Quebec she emigrated to the Northeast Kingdom with her husband Edward Fournier In her honor we brew beautifully soft unfiltered Helles lager Lightly hazy naturally carbonated and truly enjoyable this is the beer we dream to have shared with Marie

Its clear gleaming look and firm fine pored head goes hand in hand with its fresh and pure aroma Malty nuances are the first impressions Spezial Hell is pleasantly tangy with full round malt body that cannot fail to fascinate The soft flavour carries distinctive balance of sweet accents and bitter hoppiness It concludes on equally soft malty nuances classical festival beer in the tradition of old Bavarian brewing

Some beers are easy to make and difficult to drink but Alpenflo is the opposite on both counts It took years to acquire the materials and formula for Alpenflo we re talking all malt row barley and we source all of the Tettnanger hops directly from family farms in Bavaria to give it that gentle spice This lager is then cold stored in horizontal lagering tanks to round out the flavor profile Once opened that frothy beverage is gone in flash

Clean refreshing this Bavarian style lager uses four different German grains three hop varieties to create an intricate flavor profile beautiful deep golden color Helles is brewed in the style of Munich everyday drinking beer Prost
The decree states that only four ingredients can be used when making beer barley hops yeast and water The result is lager with crisp finish and rich golden colour

From the brewery Hummin Bird is Light Lager or Hell Helles similar to those found throughout Bavaria We use carefully selected Pilsner Malt then it is delicately hopped with imported Tettnang Noble Hops Then we add proprietary lager yeast strain which is not filtered out providing ones daily supply of vitamin Hummin Bird is slow cold aged for over one month resulting in lush mouth feel

This lager harmoniously combines lager yeast fermentation and west coast IPA hops Our India style Pale Lager is like traditional IPA but with twist it fermented cold and aged for extended periods blend of classic American hops creates huge tropical fruit and citrusy hop aroma dry finish accentuates the pleasant bitterness and hop profile Hoponius Union uses locally grown dehulled spelt from MA IBU
The distinct hop character of an IPA in smooth lager The hops in this brew lend bright grapefruit citrus floral aroma and flavor with refreshing crisp lager finish

In the spirit of our local history we are revolting against the status quo We are writing our own story by fueling the fire surrounding extra hoppy beers We infuse Mass Rising with increasing amounts of American hops during the kettle hopbock and dry hopping processes Together we have taken journey to redefine the term lager IBUs IBU

This is an intensely hoppy and strong lager that we refer to as Double India Pale Lager Over four pounds of hops per BBL of New Zealand hops Kiwi Hops were used in progressively larger hop additions throughout the brewing process Four kettle hop additions whole leaf hops in the hop back and multiple dry hop additions infuse an intense floral and citrusy aroma No kiwifruit or kiwi birds were used in the production of this beer

Our spring seasonal offering brewed with percent positive vibrations and single hopped with Citra hops The presence of the Citra hop is elevated by clean fermenting lager yeast that allows the subtle Pilsner Munich and Vienna malts to lay crisp bready foundation The citrus and tropical fruit character of the Citra hop comes from kettle additions followed by huge dose of em again in the fermenter

Dream Machine an India Pale Lager or IPL is melding of varied visions of an India Pale Ale and an Amber Lager Once poured its light copper color delights the eyes and citrusy hop aroma flows through the nose Upon first sip smooth hop bitterness reveals itself fresh bold and slightly spicy before subtle hints of mild maltiness appear big hop bite and crisp clean lager finish combine for beautifully balanced beer Take Dream Machine for spin and let your reverie begin

Formerly Bell Quinannan Falls LagerLiterally born in dream Larry Bell president and founder of Bell Brewery dreamt that he was at the mystically hidden retreat of Quinannan Falls somewhere in the boreal north Neither Quinannan Falls nor the beer actually existed outside his imagination but he remembered enough about it to sketch recipe and label which was put into full form by Michigan artist Kathleen Kalinowski the following morning The end result is dry hopped lager that possesses crisp dry bitterness you would expect from German pilsner but the use of highly aromatic Simcoe hops from the Pacific Northwest evoke the fragrant pine forests that inspired this beer

We re celebrating hop mania with our outrageously hoppy lager Excess IPL Various methods of hopping throughout the brewing and lagering process maximize the aromas With bold hop aromatics and flavors this India Pale Lager is packed to the brim with intense hop goodness IBUs

Gotta give the people what they want right lot of you have been searching for your next go to beer Something hoppy but still drinkable and refreshing Search no further Six varieties of American whole flower hops Centennial Mosaic Azacca Cascade Chinook and Citra pack bold and juicy flavors into this crisp drinkable lager Meet Victory Home Grown Your NEW American Lager

Brewed in collaboration with Sierra Nevada Brewing Company collaboration beer between Bitburger Brewery and Sierra Nevada Brewery this lager is highlighted by combination of American hops Cascade Centennial and Chinook paired together with Siegelhopfen Bitburger proprietary and unique hop blend that sourced from farm just few minutes from the brewery Unique to this one time brew that same farm provided the Cascade hops that lends Triple Hop Lager its desirable floral and citrus grapefruit profile

We have turned our brew house into brewer playground with the introduction of our Craft Beer Exploration Series called Mad Noisy Brewing named after the two rivers that merge and flow through the village of Creemore Hops Bolts India Pale Lager is the first release in our ever changing series of imaginative innovative and delicious craft concoctions Czech twist on an English IPA it takes the best components of lager and an ale and rivets them together to build beer much greater than the sum of its parts IBU

An evolution of the single hop phenomenon While Galaxy is featured on the label the concept here is to showcase this headliner in it greatest form possible and if you ask me every hop is better when supported by others So accents of Centennial Sterling to widen the frequency and crank up the volume of bright tangerine grapefruit and fresh grass

Generously dry hopped with blend of Mosaic and Saphir hops Metropolis Lager unites classic German style brewing and West Coast innovation to create refreshing yet flavorful lager Metropolis pours radiant gold with tropical fruit aromas and delicate floral note Caramel malts lend subtle sweetness to balance the dry crisp character of the lager yeast

This ground breaking style combines the essential ingredients and hopping methods used to create world class P Then using our expert lagering techniques and house lager yeast we created an instant favorite among the existing and steadily growing number of hop heads and craft lager heads in the beer world today Gulo Gulo P is hopped with Cascade Chinook Columbus Warrior and Pilgrim hops It is dry hopped once in the fermenter and then second time with whole cone Cascade hops before packaging

Tropical IPL We gave our classic Hoponius Union tropical fruit twist to create Hoponius on Holiday This IPL combines cold lager fermentation with West Coast IPA hop profile blend of classic American hops accentuates the tropical fruit flavors and lends citrusy aroma refreshingly crisp finish complements the pleasant bitterness of the hops and leaves you wanting more

Collaboration with SØle Artisan Ales Forget West coast IPAs here in the Northeast we re pioneering whole new style We ve joined forces with Søle Artisan Ales to bring you hazy creamy and juicy IPL with seriously intense tropical hop aroma and just enough bitterness to keep you coming back for more
IBU
India Pale Lager

Kyara is the Japanese word for deep golden brown color tinged with red and gives its name to this beer of the same hue Aromatic hops carry notes of white grapes and spicy citrus while fresh clean bitterness unfolds on the palate Six different malts are combined with slightly higher than average alcohol content bringing more expansive flavor to this well rounded medium bodied brew Low temperature lager yeasts make this stand up beer with pleasant crisp finish

This India Pale Lager infuses the complexity of our lagers with the addition of AmericanWest Coast hops Simcoe Hops provide pronounced piney aroma while the Amarillo Hops provide the citrus like aroma perfect harmony in classic rendition of this new school style
This India Pale Lager boasts notes of pine and spice from bountiful additions of Simcoe Chinook and Columbus hops The use of Rye adds depth to the malt backbone while imparting subtle spiciness
Hop forward session lager featuring aggressive late kettle Dry hop additions of Citra Citrusy fruity and crushable
An aggressively Citra hopped American pale lager refreshing and perfect for the summer

There are few hops out there that brewers everywhere are constantly in pursuit of and Nelson Sauvin is one of of them We wanted to brew something that would convey our excitement about this hop and out of that desire our Nelson IPL was born By using lighter malt base blend of pilsner and row and squeaky clean German Lager yeast this allows Nelson to show off and rightfully so Exploding with white wine fruitiness and gooseberry we recruited the assistance of Wakatu and Dr Rudi to balance the hop profile This beer is spotlight on New Zealand and we hope you grow just as fond of the Southern Hemisphere as we have

Easy drinking sessionable lager loaded with american and Australian hops for loads of citrus and tropical fruit flavor over smooth clean and dry lager character Brewed with awesome hops awesome barley awesome water and awesome yeast just for you why because your awesome man

This Lager IPA hybrid is revolution in refreshment and flavour All the crisp clean notes of the finest lager but with the discrete bitter finish of well balanced IPA It not confused about what it wants to be it just the best of both worlds

A lager at heart malty crisp and refreshing with the hoppy aroma that you would expect from an India Pale Ale This beer is hybrid that takes two very different styles Pilsner and IPA and mashes them up into unique highly drinkable beer

Our hazy India Pale Lager is making its oz can debut with slightly tweaked dry hop treatment from the most previous release in We doubled down on the dry hop and incorporated New Zealand Motueka and German Mandarina Bavaria hops For good measure we hit it with some Citra We knew you wouldn mind Soft and citrus saturated hazy lager that an absolute crusher Throwing an absurd amount of American hops at classic lager seemed only natural for us Shh don tell the Germans We like to keep them at arm length IBU TYPE Spring SeasonalMalts Row Pale Ashburne BonlanderHops Bravo Citra AmarilloYeast House Lager
THE BEAUTY OF LAGER is it creates clean dry brew that allows hops to shine in this case citrus lemon tropical dank mix all expressed with soft mildly sweet and super smooth biscuit malt canvas

Bitter Unicorn Tears is highly imaginary recipe that the fine folks at Tyler Taproom and Deep River developed as departure from the traditional IPA An India Pale Lager IPL is like an IPA from parallel universe We use lager strain of yeast in this beer and ferment it at lower temperature which helps to highlight the hop flavor and aroma We hop this beer with over two pounds per barrel of blend of some of the most hard to get hops known as unicorn tears in the hop world The unicorn tears mixed with rainbow shavings help make this beer highly coveted No unicorns were harmed in the making of this beer

Nühell is new type of lager This succubus of beer will entise you and suck you in with it bright lager appearance By then it too late there is no going back The hop flavor and aroma will lay you out as well as any IPA yet has the crisp palate cleansing effects of lager Brewed with all New Zealand hops Nühell IPL is lager all true hop fanatics will lose their heads over

India Pale Lager brewed with Colorado ingredients We don believe the world needs another IPA We do however believe there is room for beer that is similar to an IPA but is one that allows the hop characters to shine through as only lager can do An IPA done better if you will To get this clean crisp character we brewed an IPA style beer using lager yeast The lager yeast is superior in this case because it doesn create all of the fruity esters and fusel alcohols that ale yeast create so it allows the delicate hop oils to shine through in the beer Our IPL takes longer to brew and is more expensive to make than an IPA but once you try this IPL we think you ll agree It worth the extra time and expense

Collaboration with Threes BrewingTake it easy fella Have it both ways light pilsner malt base our house lager yeast and Saphir and Citra hops brewed in collaboration with our friends at Threes Brewing in Brooklyn
A hoppy pilsner hopped with Saaz Fieldwork Dank Blend

Similar to an IPA our Citra Blanc is very hop forward and refreshing for those who like their beer to pack punch With citrus hoppy take on classic lager the combination of Citra and Hallertau Blanc hops create the bright flavors and aromatics IBU

This is hoppy Mexican lager inspired by San Diego garage homebrew recipe from Bitterness is light and crisp but hop aroma flavor are front and center We overuse the word tropical but there really no better way to describe Citraveza as the interaction between the lager yeast and these hops make for truly unique beer
An India Extra Pale Lager brewed with Citra Mosaic and Galaxy

Express pours golden straw colour with white lacing Complex hop aromas of citrus tropical fruits and pine fill the nose Bright lemon orange pineapple and mango meld seamlessly with pine notes over crisp and light malt background followed by pleasant lingering bitterness that not overpowering

Asahi Super Dry was direct result of extensive market research which indicated consumer preference for more palatable beer with less maltiness relatively high alcohol content and light aftertaste that paired well with the changing Japanese diet With this insight Asahi used its brewing knowledge to develop beer with crisp bite refreshing taste and clear finish to satisfied this requirement Code named project FX Asahi engineered highly attenuated highly carbonated pilsner The later renamed product Super Dry began sales on March th and gave birth to the dry beer category The market success spawned similar competitor products and initiated what was known as the Dry Wars in Japan and brief marketing fad for dry beers internationally However Asahi has stood the test of time and now years later Super Dry continues it legacy as the world premier dry beer Special Yeast Asahi is the proprietary ingredient used to give Super Dry its dryness This special strand of yeast produces high attenuation during fermentation in conjunction with the choice grains Finest Ingredients Asahi uses select grains and hops sourced worldwide based on strict criteria to maintain flavor consistency and promote sustainability Barely with high starch content and both noble style bitter and fine aroma hops are key contributors to Super Dry smooth taste ABV Depends on package type and location IBU SRM

With an even more refreshing taste new draft beer was born in the summer of the same year draft beer celebrated its th birthday The backdrop to the primary color designs tradition in draft beer is cool crisp color of champagne gold The three stars and our logo proudly stand out and the champagne gold color expresses the fine quality and refreshing sense of beer The design incorporates the red sun blue skies and navy blue seas of Okinawa in the color scheme

Beerlao is brewed from the best local rice and overseas high quality malt giving it unique taste Beerlao was launched in and has become the best selling and leading brand in Laos It was also awarded gold medals by various international competitions Beerlao is one of the most successful exports and is currently available in countries worldwide

Koshihikari Echigo Beer is rice lager beer that uses super premium short grain rice called Koshihikari Produced in the ideal rice growing region of Niigata Prefecture Koshihikari is known to be the best quality rice in Japan The flavor of this premium beer can only be made with this rice
This seasonal treasure is brilliantly delicate it dry and bright with prominent rice character that pairs beautifully with fresh sushi
A dry crisp American Japanese style lager brewed with over rice and Premium Extra Pale Pilsner malt and hopped with Japanese Soriachi Ace
This hybrid Japanese judo chop to the mouth is made with malt rice and sake yeast Soft notes of rice plum pear and tropical fruit with dry and crisp finish

Introducing KANKITSU our Japanese inspired Lager brewed with rice green tea lemongrass lime and dry hopped with Motueka First we start with blend of what we consider to be the two most flavorful types of malted barley on this planet Golden Promise and floor malted Bohemian Pilsner Our house lager yeast and healthy dose of rice to the mash provides an extra crisp and supremely quaffable lager The additions of green tea lemongrass and lime adds very unique citrusy components to really round out the beer and provide an exceptional finish that keeps you wanting more and more We re incredibly excited to share this with you
Lime Star Fruit Aromatic Ebullient Dry Hopped Lager Anson Mills Carolina Gold Rice

Inspired by the lagers of Japan we used rice to lighten the body and make this ultra refreshing beer The crane is known as symbol of happiness and peace in Japan and folding one thousand paper cranes is believed to bring luck

Light Alcohol but not light flavoured Straw coloured Aromatic hop bouquet with elements of lemon zest lime and trace of white pepper Sorachi Ace hops create long focused finish Premium Row malted barley flaked brewing rice Sorachi ace hops
A Crushable Rice Lager Don think any more information is necessary Please Enjoy Responsibly
Pale straw colored this lager is crisp quenching incredibly light and highly attenuated Flavors of mild rice sweetness and soft lemon gently dry hopped with Lemondrop and Saphir
A super crisp Japanese style lager beer made with Koji Rice and Sorachi Ace Hops Refreshing and smooth no matter where in the world you are

At strength its gets compelling character not from leftover yeast in fact the beer is centrifuged to precise degree leaving only faint haze in its orange amber color but from an unusual combination of hops Joining lemony herbal Hallertauer Mittelfrüh is rare heirloom hop called Hallertauer Record Schäfer said that the variety has nearly disappeared only one hectare grew last year but he wanted its spicy character It not flashy beer meant for sipping and sampling just tasty one that will reward repeat drinking

Formerly PILZILLA Pilzilla is beer that ve been brewing for years Each year it gets bigger and bigger Nicknamed The beer that took over Tokyo It is an unfiltered Keller Bier Nicley hopped at this point with to different kinds of hops and about ABV Each year we will add another variety of hop and bump the alcohol bit This is not your average pilsner get it before we drink it all Prost

Our flagship lager pronounced zv ick el is an unfiltered unpasteurized German classic that finishes as smooth drinking vitamin rich from the yeast naturally cloudy bier Malts Two Row PilsnerHops Hallertau IBU

A UUNGESPUNDET NATÜRTRÜBAfter comes The stands for Ungespundet which means unfiltered and outrageously good Simply pronounced Ahh Ooo like the two vowels means you would like U beer No language skills required and you finally have great beer that doesn take long time to order What comes to your table if one orders U You ll get an extraordinary yeast turbid specialty beer with full bodied smooth malt character Pleasantly tart and lightly carbonated it is beer that goes just as well with good meal as it does with relaxing evening after work Did somebody say cult beer Yeah why not That fine with us Sure you could always say one But experience has taught us that that rarely the case Mahrs Bräu beer pairing recommendation with cold cut platters Eisbein Haxen hearty dishes with dark meat COLOR cloudy amberHOP Hallertauer PerleYEAST Bottom fermented IBU

The beer presents itself in palely amber colour with orange reflections and mellow soft head The complex flavour is firstly dominated by caramel with slight undertone of honey roasted almonds and fresh fruity flavours that bring tastes of green apple to mind Grevensteiner Original appears very crisp and elegant despite its round and malty sweet body smooth toasty character paired with nutty flavours opens distinctive finale which unfolds impressions of butterscotch

Our San Diego roots are landing in Virginia Beach Bringing you freshness from East to West Sea to Sea is an unfiltered Zwickel lager layered with German Pilsner malts Hallertau Mittelfreüh and Czech Saaz hops row barley and traditional Pilsner yeast This sessionable brew has light body with subtle sweet malt and fruity hop flavors notable lager yeast and crisp clean finish
Formerly also known as Aktien Zwick Kellerbier

Kellerbier is an unfiltered medieval German beer known for its naturally cloudy appearance Served straight from the brewmaster cellar it was true honour for special guests visiting brewery to be offered taste These days we happily make it available to one and all Our Kellerbier is wonderfully aromatic with hint of citrus and spice imparted by German whole leaf hops Not too many breweries make Kellerbier but then we ve always done things little differently IBU

Crisp golden lagerBeer is meant to be shared and nothing says summer like sharing crisp golden lager with friends This traditional German style lager is brewed with blend of European malts and hops to create refreshing easy drinking beer Bronze Medal Kellerbier or Zwickelbier Great American Beer Festival

Combining our brewery super soft water and the finest German hops this unfiltered keller pilsner is crushable Brewed as traditional European continental pilsner this is what beer tastes like pouring from the wooden vats used to make lager beer for centuries in the Czech Republic town of Plzeň

Kellerbiers originated in German cellars when brewers couldn wait to taste the fruits of their labors so they tapped young beers straight from barrels Our version ages on oak chips for refreshing juxtaposition of light unfiltered malts with an intriguing woodsy note

Our Zeppelin Beer is so called Kellerbier The name Kellerbier has historical roots dating back to the time when beer was still served directly from the cellar It is an unfiltered naturally cloudy beer with low carbon dioxide content and it contains all of the natural sediment As result Kellerbier is rich in valuable nutrients such as yeast protein minerals and vitamins Following the old family tradition Zeppelin beer is brewed in accordance with the German Purity Law of As with all of our beers we use the world famous Tettnanger aromatic hops high quality barley grown in upper Swabia and pure water from the uplands of the Alps We give the dark amber Zeppelin beer seven weeks to quietly mature The result is fully flavoured mildly malty Kellerbier of the highest quality and goodness with an alcohol content of percent It a beer which is almost unrivaled in taste thanks to its extremely delicately spiced original flavor
Keller Pilsner brewed with touch of malted wheat Hopped with Citra
Decoction mash and the exclusive use of Vienna malt creates traditional malty character Lightly hopped with Bavarian hops and left unfiltered yielding lightly fruity aroma IBU OGPLATO
Previously called th Anniversary Series Keller Pils
Unfiltered golden lager inspired by the Kellerbiers or cellar beers found in the northern Bavarian region of Franconia This Kellerbier marries rich malt flavor with an herbal hop character
Also known as Arcobräu Zwicklbier

Steeped in tradition yet ready for anything that pretty much sums up our Southern Gothic Unfiltered Pils This hop forward but light bodied pilsner is crisp and drinkable perfect for an afternoon on the porch or night down at the pub We left it unfiltered and raw to bring out its complexity and add depth of flavor BITTERING HOPS Magnum SaphirFINISHING HOPS Saphir SterlingMALTS Pilsner Vienna Acidulated IBU
Collaboration with Russian River Brewing CompanyKeller Pils collaboration with Russian River to commemorate the Firestone Walker Invitational Beer Fest
Formerly Münchner Sommerbier

Enchanting Ethereal Fleeting Is that woman in the distance or are your eyes playing tricks on you Luchesa Lager is brewed in the traditional German Kellerbier style where subtle malt notes marry with assertive Hallertau and Saaz hops Like mirage your empty glass will leave you wondering Was she ever really there
Formerly Ayinger Liebhard Kellerbier

A Toast to Summer Ziggy Zoggy is an unfiltered lager that balances crisp and elegant honey like malt flavor with assertive classic German hop character Brewed in the tradition of German style Zwickelbier look it up Ziggy Zoggy is perfect for celebrating everything this summer sun and surf back yards and barbeques friends family So here to great summer filled with sunshine memories friends loved ones and all the other reasons to lift glass of Ziggy Zoggy again and again Ziggy Zoggy Ziggy Zoggy Oy Oy Oy

Brooklyn Unfiltered is sterling example of keller pilsner smooth hazy style with its roots in the earliest days of lagering Our take is brisk and gently bready with well tuned smooth finish Take it with you to the dinner table the after party and anywhere in between If you pick up bottle of Brooklyn Unfiltered and notice layer of fine sediment inside don worry Some settling can occur during storage as the yeast and malt haze falls to the bottom Give it quick swirl or steady pour into glass to mix it up and enjoy Style Unfiltered PilsnerMalts row Wheat maltHops Saaz Saphir HallertauYeast Our House Lager Yeast

The sixth of beers celebrating literary classic and one of our favorites Leaves of Grass by Walt Whitman This is our take on German style Kellerbier Rustic grains including pilsen malt and maize offer classic bready notes and light haze Herbal noble hops and tangy rye malt add light spiciness

die Königin is an unfiltered oak aged Kellerbier This strong lager pours hazy bright amber with white head Lightly effervescent with assertive biscuit qualities and an adequate Tettanang hop presence die Königin is matured for several weeks on light toast oak imparting creamy mouth feel and dry finish accentuating sweet malt qualities This Stark Lager is produced in small quantities for lager connoisseurs with the most discerning palates
Our first lager Cold conditioned for many weeks to properly balance clean full malt profile with the fresh and zest character of locally grown Sterling hops

Formerly Spica HefepilsSPICA HEFEPILS Spica is the brightest star in the constellation Virgo This Lager is brewed in the Un filtered Keller bier style Pale malt is used exclusively to give the beer nice malt body and light golden color Sterling hops add rich herbal character The yeast left in the beer works with the hops to add nice spicy flavor ABV IBU GRAVITY

Formerly known as You Never Take Me Anywhere Nice loooooong ago there was secret love affair between Styracosaurus and Triceratops which was very new to their friends and neighbors in the Cretacious neighborhood So to get everyone to accept them they threw giant hot sulphur springs party Roasted palm fronds fern salads beach balls and this beer In honor of these two progressive dinosaurs we ve made this Zwickel as closely to their recipe as possible pils carapils and slightly dry hopped We can promise it will get people to accept you but who cares We can promise it ll transport you to an amazing dino beach party In your mind at least In we thought name change for the yearly Zwickelbier You Never Take Me Anywhere Nice would be appropriate with current stay at home orders IBU
Our take on rarely seen classic Start with one of our favorite lagers and add boat load of Mandarina Bavaria hops fine balance is struck between hoppy and refreshing
Zwickel style lager conditioned in cask Includes plenty of hausgeschmack for the Stammtisch

Bud Light is brewed using blend of premium aroma hop varieties both American grown and imported and combination of barley malts and rice Its superior drinkability and refreshing flavor makes it the world favorite light beer
Bud Light Lime is brewed using combination of barley malts non malted cereal grains subtle hopping and natural lime flavor

Brewed using the finest barley malt select grains all imported hops and pure cultured yeast strain The special choice of grains combined with the extended mashing process produces smooth refreshing beer with fewer carbohydrates

Natural Light is brewed with blend of premium American and imported hops and combination of malt and corn Its longer brewing process produces lighter body fewer calories and an easy drinking character

Brewed since Keystone Light is triple filtered American style light lager Or as we like to say it the smoothest of smooth Keystone Light has clean crisp taste and smooth finish making it the beer of choice for those who want to grab life by the Stones So what are you waiting for Stop reading and get grabbing Looking for something bolder Pick up Keystone Ice

Busch and Busch Light are both brewed with blend of premium American grown and imported hops and combination of malt and corn to provide pleasant balanced flavor Additionally Busch Light undergoes longer brewing process that produces lighter body and fewer calories
ABV in the USA is

Brewed with two row and roasted caramel malt for rich color and blend of hand selected premium American and Bavarian hops for balance and flavor Budweiser Select spends approximately twice as long as regular beers in the brewhouse which results in lower carbohydrate and calorie content after fermentation
ABV in some states in the USA
Michelob Light is brewed with pale kilned two row barley malt and noble European hops

Labatt Blue Light was introduced in as lower alcohol lower calorie version of Canada most popular brand Blue Light uses specially selected North American aromatic hops and the same strain of lager yeast as the one used to produce Labatt Blue The result is crisp clean and delicately balanced beer with slight sweetness and citrus like hop character
Select is brewed with specialty malts and blend of imported and domestic hopping Select has light golden color and offers aroma notes of toasted malt and subtle hopping
Brewed using the finest two row and dark roasted specialty malts for color and blend of imported and premium United States grown noble aroma hops for balance and flavor

Michelob Golden Draft Light is premium cold filtered light lager beer that is brewed using blend of two row and six row barley malt premium American hops and rice to create its smooth refreshing taste It also undergoes longer brewing process to produce lighter taste and fewer calories

A bold choice for those who prefer light beer with clear golden color defined malt character and smooth bitterness The fermenting process and the hops used impart light citrus flavor and aroma making for truly unique light beer
Michelob ULTRA Fruit Lime Cactus has an exotic fruity aroma with clean citrus finish

The folks at the little brewery in Shiner TX pop are proud of this refreshing calorie addition to the Spoetzl family of beers It brewed with the same handcrafted small batch pride you expect from Shiner delivering unique light beer So when you re looking for smooth easy drinking brew pick up an ice cold Shiner Light Blonde It light done right PROSIT

Canned beer has made serious return in the craft brewing world Prior to this resurgence the only beer found in cans were industrial lagers So as nod in both directions we present an elegantly crisp and hoppy new world lager The light and refreshing pilsner malt body delivers an abundance of floral spice and grass driven hop flavors and aroma Perfect for those luxurious cruises through the Caribbean
Michelob ULTRA Fruit Pomegranate Raspberry delivers unique berry aroma that finishes with hint of pomegranate

Light is uniquely hand crafted using all natural ingredients malted barley the finest hops German lager yeast and pristine Abita Springs water The result is the smoothest most flavorful light beer you will ever taste IBU

Local Light is classic American Lager crafted by Joe Short in to be beer in its simplest form It a bright yellow beer with effervescent aromatics of fresh malted barley and lager yeast Local Light has soft and subtle flavors of malt that finish crisp and clean that perfectly balanced for smooth and easy drinkability IBU
Brewed with real orange peels for clean and crisp taste that highlights natural citrus flavors
Canadian Light maintains the same character as Molson Canadian which is slowly fermented to provide light beer

It time to rethink light beer Right now there too much overlap bland flavors redundant branding macro brewery after macro brewery You deserve better than this sea of sameness and Nite Lite is our way to raise the light beer standard An unfiltered unpasteurized all natural craft light lager that everyone can get excited about Perfect for BBQs tailgating before the game hanging at the beach enjoying concert you know the drill Nite Lite is simple light bodied and crisp just as light beer should be

There are two variants ABV and ABV version Olde English is one of America leading malt liquor brands Commonly referred to as OE it offers smooth rich taste with slightly fruity aroma that is favorite among malt liquor drinkers OE wears the crown because it is the King of Malt Liquors

Introduced in by the Baltimore Maryland based National Brewing Company Colt was named in honor of running back Jerry Hill who was on the Baltimore Colts football team Through high profile partnerships with actor Billy Dee Williams and comedian Redd Foxx who both appeared in radio print and TV advertisements Colt established itself as the premier malt liquor beverage by the early s It was also during this time that the iconic slogan Works Every Time became synonymous with the brand The Williams relationship lasted for nearly four decades until he passed the torch to music mogul Snoop Dogg in With Snoop at the helm we ve entered an exciting new Colt era
Brewed to be our strongest tasting lager using extra malt and hops in the brewhouse and fermented to give smooth slightly sweet well balanced beer at alcohol
King Cobra is an American malt liquor with robust and full bodied smooth clean taste
Hurricane High Gravity high end malt liquor offers very full bodied flavor with smooth sweet finish
Hurricane Malt Liquor is full bodied and robust and offers smooth slightly fruity and slightly sweet taste

A lager with hard bite shouldn be hard to drink That why dog bite is brewed with select hops and malted barley for well balanced mellow taste that ll have high gravity drinkers coming back again and again

Negra Modelo better known as the cream of the beer is Munich type beer with º of alcohol that offers balanced flavor and delicate aroma of dark malt caramel and hops Today it occupies the first place in sales among dark beers in Mexico This beer is accompanied by bright deep amber color which is adorned with abundant white and compact foam Negra Modelo was introduced in Mexico in as the dark beer called Modelo to begin its great tradition In it changed its image to more sophisticated bottle but with the same content Ingredients Water barley malt non malted cereals hops
A rich dark amber beer with full flavored smooth taste nicely accented with satisfying notes of roasted malt and subtle bottom fermenting yeast tones

Dark specialties were being made in Bavaria long before the advent of pale specialties Over the years Hofbrau Dunkel lost nothing of its popularity With the rich flavour it remains refreshing beverage suitable for all occasions traditional Munich deliciousness

Up until the Second World War dark beer was the predominant beer type in the Munich area The hard water found in the region played special role in producing this specialty In his book Beer International the world renowned English beer writer Michael Jackson accurately describes the Ayinger Altbairisch Dunkel as good example of its kind Impenetrably dark with golden brown gleam when held up to the light and with warm aroma and malty taste while summoning up coffee taste sensations on going down It is brewed from five types of malt two of which are torrified dark and it is only lightly hopped It is produced using the traditional double fermentation process

A blend of specialty malts gives this beer velvety mouthfeel with roasted notes and hint of chocolate balanced by subtle hop aroma Hard to describe but easy to drink Harpoon Dark is rich in character and light on the palate IBU
Munich and various roasted malts give it very malty rich flavor with hint of burnt flavor imported Hallertau hops moderate bitterness and aroma

Dark Lager Creamy toffee aromas balance the bitterness of Munich malts in our roasted brown lager Although dark in color Dunkel is medium in body and finishes dry and clean resulting in rich lager that can be enjoyed throughout the year IBU

Velkopopovický Kozel Dark beer is brewed to the original recipe using special mix of dark malts clean water from our own well close to the brewery and selection of the best hops The caramelized malt gives this beer unique ruby color and sweet flavor thanks to which it is appreciated and respected all over the world
premium dark ale

Styled after traditional European Dunkel lager with dark caramel malt flavor with smooth dry finish One of our Original Brau beers Capital Dark is our most award winning beer and still remains an all time favorite

Navigating the labyrinth of brewery licensing and state regulations isn easy When we finally got the green light we also got inspired with the perfect name for our pilot brew Red Tape Lager has full malty flavor typical of Bavarian dark lagers It brewed with Dark Munich Malt Additions of Glacier hops for bittering and noble German hops for aroma strike balance between American and European flavors IBU
This medium bodied amber German style lager combines frighteningly smooth malt flavor with haunting spicy finish of cinnamon and nutmeg for scary good brew that is definitely all treat no trick

Dark beers are the traditional Bavarian beers Common mild malt flavor is all in addition to the rich red black color Our dark pronounced freshness in the on trunk is added then goes up in soft roundness The monastery of darkness is beer for connoisseurs It is suitable all year round but especially it fits to the traditional Bavarian cuisine

Few things accompany long winter nights as well as this Munich style Dunkel Bock Savor our brewmaster enticing blend of dark roasted and sweet caramel malts Capped by an oatmeal colored head the rich flavors of this Bavarian style lager make it the perfect selection for long winter nights Randy Winter brew is Munich style dunkel bock of much repute among those who know us best It has won the World Beer Cup Gold and Bronze medals Degrees Plato Initial Gravity PWeeks Aged Year First Brewed Serving Temperature Malts Black Patent Caramel Chocolate PaleHops Cascade Chinook Mt Hood Tettnanger

Winter has met its match in the form of this classic Munich style dark lager Smooth with caramel and roasted malt flavors courtesy of Dark Munich and Carafa malts Dunkel offers an easy drinking finish to even the coldest darkest days of winter It may be freezing outside but the conditions inside this bottle of Dunkel are always absolutely perfect Enjoy it all winter long

Don let the Slingshot color fool you it has light body and smooth complexities that will remind you to never judge book by its cover Or more likely it ll just remind you that beer is pretty darn good thing

Formerly Altfränkisches Dunkel BierThis is dark amber lager made in the world famous brewing area around Bamberg Germany They are characterized by their smooth malty flavor The Franconian version differs from the dark lagers of Bavaria by being slightly stronger and drier Dunkels have distinctive malty flavor that comes from special brewing technique called decoction mashing We are reviving the Altfränkisches Dunkel Bier from the Hümmer Brauerei in Breitengüßbach the brewery whose brewhouse now resides in Denver Colorado at Prost Brewing ABV IBU
Long John Lager is robust easygoing Dunkel Lager The caramelized malty sweetness is nicely balanced by toasted nuttiness that ll surely light up your taste buds on winter day

Dunkel means dark and our Dunkel copies the traditional brown Munich lager that was the most widely drunk beer in Bavaria at the turn of the th Century Dunkel is made from amber colored Munich malt Germans approach dark beer from different direction than their Belgian and British neighbors Instead of using small amount of high color dark roasted or caramelized malt Germans use lot of low or medium color malt that avoids the acrid bitter roastiness or burnt sugar flavors found in stouts and porters Dunkel is medium bodied beer with slightly sweet toasted bread crust malt flavor and smooth finish accentuated with just enough noble bitterness to balance the malt IBU

Once upon time in the land of Bavaria darkness fell upon the beer in the town of Munich But have no fear this darkness was born of toasted malt that produces bready chocolate flavor This full bodied brew is now known as Munich Dunkel Our dunkel is made with just enough hoppy bitterness to scare away any overt sweetness Then it is carefully lagered to produce cleaness that no one will shudder at

Characterised by its firm and fine pored head Even before the first sip the beer epicure will register the soft aromas of dark malt carrying caramel and cocoa accents with nuance of smokiness Andechser Export Dunkel is pleasantly tangy with full round malty body The nuance of quality plain chocolate marries well with the soft bitterness of the smoky undertone It concludes on mild harmonious note

In the Oktoberfest tradition was born when Munich celebrated the Crown Prince wedding with special beer and day party Our version of this classic style blends hearty malts for deep smooth flavor of caramel creating brew that perfect for the season or whatever you re celebrating Smooth with roasty sweetness and light hop character

An amber beer style that was developed to celebrate the original Oktoberfest over years ago This full bodied beer with its rich malt flavor dark toffee note and underlying fruitiness has masterful hop balance The secrets behind Paulaner excellent taste and unwavering quality are locally sourced ingredients and tradition of craftsmanship that has been passed down and perfected by our dedicated brewmasters since Here in Munich Paulaner beer is not mere product It a matter of the heart

Prost Our take on this classic German style is celebration of maltiness packed with rustic autumnal flavors to put little more oomph into your oom pah pah Über smooth with vibrant malt flavors and festive flourish of noble hops lederhosen not included World Beer Championships Time Medal Winner Gold Silver

Friendship and camaraderie the two keys to any festive event And then there the beer It should be full bodied yet infinitely smooth Seductively malty with kiss of the hops for balance This is our Festbier Painstakingly crafted from German malts decoction brewed for full flavor and carefully aged for depth of character Subtly sweet with delicate malt nose our Festbier gains its impressive body from our use of all imported German malts and decoction brewing process Gather with your friends for festive moment of Victory

Forbidden as it was to brew in summer stronger beer the Märzen was brewed earlier in March It would finally be served at the Oktoberfest under the Heaven of Bavaria We have returned once again to the age old recipe and recreated that gloriously smooth honey coloured piece of history from times gone by And all is brewed with due reverence to the Bavarian Purity Law of
A full rich bodied hoppy seasonal lager Especially brewed for the Festbier season This beer truly represents the Bavarian way of celebrating Deep gold color great mouth feel and lots of flavor Prost

Rich and toasty Märzen style beerOur proud German heritage shines through in our homage to arguably the world greatest festival traditional Märzen style beer our Leinenkugel Oktoberfest has toasted malt flavor and subtle spicy hop notes that make it perfect for celebrating fall in true German fashion So let your steins runneth over IBU

When Crown Prince Ludwig of Bavaria wanted to celebrate his wedding engagement in he did what any good Bavarian prince would he threw beer festival Both the festival and the special beer served there became known as Oktoberfest Brewed from the finest German malt and hops Brooklyn Oktoberfest is true to the original style fullbodied and malty with bready aroma and light brisk hop bitterness

The Oktoberfest originated in in Munich Germany as wedding celebration for the Crown Prince Ludwig of Bavaria This product was created especially for this event and is brewed usually for the Oktoberfest now the largest beer festival in the world Hofbräu München HB is one of selected group of breweries granted the privileges of supplying the Oktoberfest with their products Using the highest quality ingredients HB Oktoberfest Specialty has its own distinctive and unique taste

The Kaiser once said Give me woman who loves beer and will conquer the world If the Kaiser and his significant other had tipped this bottle we all be sprechenden Deutsch We took all that is good in traditional Oktoberfest gorgeous deep copper sheen massive malty backbone and spicy floral pungent Noble hops then intensified each into this an Imperial Oktoberfest

This is no festivus for the restivus on the contrary we start brewing in the spring and it takes full two months to reach lagered perfection Biscuity malty goodness dominates upfront while the noble pedigree hops lend properly spicy dry finish

Crafted as flavorful session beer and perfect for autumn Octoberfest spends full six weeks fermenting With herbal hop aromas this balanced amber lager focuses on lightly toasted malt that lends body without too much sweetness Perfect for week long wedding celebration in Germany or the start of the Michigan autumn

The character and complexity of Harpoon Octoberfest comes from the malt and hops When looking at freshly poured Harpoon Octoberfest you will notice the garnet red color with firm creamy head The beer color is from blend of Munich chocolate and pale malt The thick head results in part from wheat malt added to the grist The hop aroma of this beer is not overpowering but it is present Tettnang hops add subtle spice nose that blends with the malt character This beer is full bodied smooth and malty Willamettehops are used to provide gentle bitterness and to balance any residual sweetness present from the malt The finish is soft and malty with mild bitterness IBU

Just like the world largest beer festival our little brewrey has Bavarian roots and long tradition of honoring tradition Which is why we made this märzen style with German grown Hallertau tradition If that doesn make you polka dance for joy we don know what will

Natural great Midwestern and European Malts the world most expensive hops fresh yeast from Germany and clear Wisconsin water make our Staghorn Octoberfest Wisconsin Real Red You will find absolutely no additives preservatives or artificial agents of any kind in this bier Staghorn is brewed using the time honored methods to release the smooth flavor of our roasted malts This Octoberfest combines smooth amber body with clean crisp finish Be sure to hold this one up to the light of any harvest moon and enjoy Wisconsin Real Red

HOSS is based on the Märzen lagers of Germany Rich layered malt notes with hints of cherry and dark fruits dominate while the unique addition of rye imparts slightly earthy spicy character Hoss finishes crisp and dry and its brilliant red orange color is toast to the sunsets that make the perfect backdrop for this beer AWARDS Great American Beer Festival Bronze Medal Rye Beer World Beer Cup Bronze Medal Rye Australian International Beer Awards Gold Medal Overall Champion Lager

Yuengling is proud to offer our Oktoberfest as an homage to our German Heritage Copper in color this medium bodied beer is the perfect blend of roasted malts with just the right amount of hops to capture true representation of the style IBU

Formerly Goose OktoberfestGoose Fest Bier is brimming with notes of toasted malt and freshly baked rye bread This light bodied German lager is clean and crisp with fine noble hop character and mild earthy bitterness that is the hallmark of Hallertau hops Raise few steins of Goose Fest Bier this fall and celebrate this time honored tradition Prost

Our most popular beer Märzen Maert zen is smooth mildly sweet auburn colored lager This beer originated from Bavaria where it was brewed in March Marz in German and stored in caves to be enjoyed during warmer weather At the end of September any remaining kegs of Märzen were consumed during the two week celebration which became famous as Oktoberfest We hope you ll enjoy it year round IBU

Oaktoberfest is true German Marzen bier brewed with premium imported Pilsner and Vienna malts and is spiced with Bavarian hop from the mother land Light Amber in color soft malty profile full bodied lager beer Fermented with the famous Bavarian Augustiner Lager yeast from Munich We utilized German Hallertauer Traditions for both bittering and aroma additions adding rich noble hop presence to this beer

Celebrate German heritage with this authentic German Specialty Beer truly German import brewed according to the German Purity Law as are all Warsteiner beers in limited quantities especially for Oktoberfest celebrations This special edition has well balanced mild and smooth taste with uniquely soft hoppy aftertaste and alcohol So bring bit of Germany with you to your next Oktoberfest celebration and bring Warsteiner Oktoberfest Special Edition

Our fall seasonal beer Bob Oktoberfest is medium bodied dark amber brew with malty flavor and well balanced hop character With this Munich style lager we salute our friend Bob Werkowitch Master Brewer and graduate of the S Brewer Academy IBU

Brewed in the classic Märzen style with Northern Brewer hops from Germany Rich toffee malt flavors up front with clean hop finish as crisp as the autumn air Unfortunately like the fall colors this seasonal beer is gone before you know it

Our Dead Ringer Oktoberfest lager is inspired by old style Märzen brews customarily enjoyed during Bavaria world famous beer festival Thanks to an abundance of toasted malt and lower hop bitterness this dark reddish brown lager is loaded with sweet caramel toffee flavors and aromas All the taste and celebration of Oktoberfest packed into one bottle no lederhosen required

Labeled as Oktoberfest Bier in Germany and Oktoberfest Wiesn in the US This full bodied golden Oktoberfest lager is the only beer served in Paulaner Oktoberfest tents today It is the pinnacle of German brewing wonderfully mellow with balanced harmonious taste It has strong note of malt and the pleasant fragrance of hops

Ancient timelines talk of dark days plagued by hardships and Kingdom demands When hope was all but lost legend emerged plumber With copper pipes and an uncanny wit he battled fierce foes and saw to the brewery opening Our Octoberfest is malty smooth and exceedingly drinkable It is perfect to celebrate and honor today legends We use locally grown wheat from MA Munich malt and noble hops IBU

Named with our atom colliding scientific neighbor in mind this Oktoberfest style lager is oak aged providing added layers of depth to the signature flavors of roasted malt caramel and toffee found in marzen style beers But beer this exceptional shouldn be limited to just Oktoberfest Raise glass stein or boot to Augustfest Septemberfest and beyond

A full bodied malty slightly sweet beer celebrating the Autumn harvest This rich beer has round malt flavor and an above average alcohol content perfect for cool fall evening Malt Three different blended Munich style malts Hops Czech Saaz and Tettnanger Original Gravity Plato Color Red Amber Bitterness IBU

Our Oktoberfest is traditional Bavarian Märzen with toasty malt aroma and slight caramel taste This rich amber lager is balanced by the use of German noble hops while the lager yeast ferments cold and slow creating smooth crisp beer Märzen or Oktoberfest has its origins in Bavaria most likely before the th century For public safety and brewing quality concerns the Bavarian Brauordnung was decreed in stating that beer could only be brewed from September th Saint Michael to April rd Saint George Over the summer months beers were stored or lagered in caves and stone cellars The evolution of Oktoberfest came from the last brews of the year in March or Märzen as these beers would be ready to drink for the Bavarian celebration Oktoberfest IBU

A classic German style Oktoberfest beer that goes down smooth with pleasant toasty malt flavor German malts create supple and flavorful base for this traditional Oktoberfest lager Our version is brewed with hop called Hallertau Gold grown on only one farm in the whole of Bavaria to deliver hop profile which is at the same time both classic and unique IBUs

Originally brewed couple hundred years ago to celebrate the betrothal of the Crown Prince of Bavaria we re helping keep the tradition alive by brewing Oktoberfest every fall for our most royal loyal followers

Formerly known as Oktoberfest Lager Aged for months prior to release this Märzen style lager is brewed using German hops and yeasts true to tradition Its orange amber hue reminds us of the fall foliage that accompanies the season and its elegant and complex malt structure produces smooth drinkable brew Its otherworldly richness finishes with hints of spice and subtle hop flavor just enough to entice you to have another wherever in the universe you may be
Ein prosit This seasonal gem is best enjoyed under humongous tent while you and thousands of your closest friends sing enthusiastically Or anywhere really It all about the gemütlichkeit baby

Based on the Bavarian style beer that Narragansett produced in the s and s this elegant Oktoberfest style Marzen is brewed with the highest quality German malts and hops Weyermann Munich malt creates rich bready and toasty base while the noble Tettnang hops add crisp but subtle and dry spiced finish King Grambrinus would be proud

The Oktoberfest or Marzen March type of beer was originally brewed in March and laid down in caves before the summer weather rendered brewing impossible Stocks would be drawn upon heavily during the summer and exhausted by October In Germany this tradition has come to be associated with one specific style Oktoberfest Bier In keeping with true German tradition August Schell Oktoberfest beer is brewed just once year Brewed with the perfect balance of Pale Munich and Cara Pils malt with Liberty and Perle hops to create rich smooth taste
GABF Gold Medal German Style Marzen The mother of all seasonal beers has fiery amber hue with rich malty overtones that dominate the flavor
Bavarian inspired Asheville made This Märzen lager is smooth and well rounded with toasty malt character
Gold Medal Winner in the German style Oktoberfest category at the Great American Beer Festival GABF

The TuberFest is smooth and malty lager that is counterbalanced with some delicious Pacific NorthWestern Idaho hops giving it cedary herbal zing Brewed to jumpstart your salubrious slide into late Summer

ABV may vary slightly year to year Aecht Original Schlenkerla Maerzen Smokebeer considered the classic example in its category has been brewed for centuries in the baroque town of Bamberg in Franconia Bavaria Germany Following the most ancient malting traditions all its select barley malts are kilned over fire of beech wood logs at the Schlenkerla maltings Brewed in classic copper vessels and matured for months in th century cellars Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier is truly unique smoky beer experience
First tapping every first Thursday of October bitter Smokebock for the strongbeer season October through December Matured for weeks in the deep rock cellar and tapped freshly from the oakwood cask

Cloaked in mystery this dark black beer skirts the line between schwarzbier and smoked porter The use of small percentage of traditional Beechwood smoked malt adds complexity and balances the liberal use of chocolate malt Notes of roasted grains beechwood smoke and coffee accompany full bodied and sweet chocolately malt character Smoke Dagger uses locally grown unmalted barley from MA IBU

Facts on Aecht Schlenkerla Eiche While for the classic Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier traditionally beech has been and still is used the malt for Schlenkerla Oak Smoke is kilned with oak wood The resulting Schlenkerla Oak Smokemalt has smoother and more multilayered smoky note than the intensely aromatic beech smokemalt The hence complex smokiness in this double bock is paired with the multifaceted bitterness of finest Hallertau aroma hops With alcohol and amber color it matures for months in the th century brewery cellars into special treat for smoke beer lovers As one of the last traditionally made smoked beers Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier is passenger in the Ark of Taste by SlowFood Brewed with Schlenkerla Oak Smoke Malt IBU from finest aroma hopsBernstein amber color

Schlenkerla Smokebeer Wheat is an ale with light smoky aroma As Bavarian wheat beers it is being brewed with mixture of both barley malt and wheat malt The portion of barley malt is hereby classic Schlenkerla smokemalt while the wheat malt remains unsmoked Served unfiltered with its natural haziness Schlenkerla Wheat reaches its full aroma through bottle fermentation with fine top fermenting yeast

The Original Schlenkerla Lentbeer is an unfiltered smokebeer brewed according to the Bavarian Purity Law of Bottom fermenting yeast gives the reddish brown lentbeer natural cloudiness Its smokey aroma is already noticeable in the smell combined with fine hoppy note In the drink the fullbodied highly drinkable lentbeer shows its strong malty flavour rounded up with the smokey taste and light bitterness Due to the nourishing yeast the Original Schlenkerla Lentbeer has the Brotzeit already included German word for afternoon snack

Caution This is an intensely smokey lager similar to those found in Bamberg Germany Most of this brew malt was dried over flaming beechwood which ingrains unique smokey flavors Aromas of campfires smoked ham and bacon dominate soft malt and hop backbone Although hard to believe this beer is vegan friendly IBU

Also known as Helles Märzen Kräusen Blend In the world of German brewing Kräusen refers to the intense proliferation of bubbles and foam formed during fermentation of young or green beer And Aufkräusen literally to kräusen it up refers to historic brewing technique in which some green beer is added to fully matured lager This is very old and very typically German tradition and today even English speaking brewers refer to this technique as krausening Krausening brings the vibrant freshness of young beer to the more refined austere flavors of fully matured lager Aecht Schlenkerla Kräusen starts out as normal Helles Schlenkerla Lager and matures for months in the old rock cellars underneath the brewery Just before filling it is blended using the before mentioned Kräusen technique with classic Märzen Rauchbier The result is an unfiltered bottom fermented and amber color Märzen Lager hybrid with vibrant and slightly smoky flavor IBU

We ve stepped out of the boxcar and created our own take on German Rauchbier Smoke beer Instead of using Beechwood we have selected the indigenous pecan wood and smoked munich malt in our homemade malt smoker The Smoky Mary has subtle smoked flavor that pairs well with barbeque and just about anything off of the grill She clocks in at alcohol by volume which makes it nice sessionable smoked beer

Smoke on the water This Bamberg inspired smoked ale is bacon in glass Very polarizing beer you either like the style and taste or you never want to drink it again Unique brewed using German malts and Noble hops

Manzanita is an imaginative take on the classic German rauchbier combining traditional ingredients with inspiration from the Northern California wilderness An assertive multi layered smoke aroma courtesy of beechwood smoked malts and charred manzanita branches gives way to light bodied structure and surprisingly delicate balance of flavors nutty herbal sweet and savory beer for campfire on crisp fall night

Smokey Balanced Refreshing This pale beer is brewed with blend of both beech wood and cherry wood smoked malts The Lubitsch Touch is very light and refreshing take on German rauchbier with just touch of balanced smoke in the finish
This style is brewed using majority of beechwood smoked malt smoked in Bamberg The smoke character is well integrated and balanced by hint of roasted malt and German hops

Smokey is dog not quite right in the head some might even say insane One of her most beloved activities is digging deep hole in the ground and barking into it for hours on end We aren quite sure what she looking for but we suspect she is looking to take on the Smoke Monster If anyone could defeat the Smoke Monster it would be Smokey so we offer you Smoke Monster in recognition of her tireless efforts

of the grain bill is composed of beech smoked barley malt an ingredient made famous in the Bavarian town of Bamberg She has the nose of cured meat and the brew pairs perfectly with cheese olives and fresh bread dark amber brew the flavor is truly unique to its color

Literally translated as black beer schwarzbiers are one of the oldest and most traditional German beer styles Dating back to around BC this dark roasty beer combines caramel and chocolate malt notes with bright flavor and crisp finish

First class refined ingredients the unique recipe and passionate brewing tradition that you can taste Köstritzer Schwarzbier stands for pleasure in perfection It is the unique roasting of malting barley to the finest roasted malt which gives Köstritzer Schwarzbier its unique malt aroma and unmatched character The market leader in the segment of bottom fermented dark beers presents itself in an elegant bubbly manner and promises special kind of beer experience at first sight with its strong color and pronounced foam crown Taste the difference and enjoy Germany most popular black beer
